name: Ext_R2_ConceptMap_el_codeSystem
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ConceptMap.element.codeSystem for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.element.codeSystem from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Code System (if value set crosses code systems)
element.definition: An absolute URI that identifies the Code System (if the source is a value set that crosses more than one code system).
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.source` maps to R5 `ConceptMap.group.source`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Code System (if value set crosses code systems)

element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.source` maps to R5 `ConceptMap.group.source`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeSystem So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
